Package com.cloudant.sync.indexing

Interface Summary
IndexFunction<T> This interface defines the IndexFunction object used to map from document to indexed values by the IndexManager object.
QueryResult Iterable result of a query executed with IndexManager.
 

Class Summary
FieldIndexFunction FieldIndexFunction is a simple IndexFunction which extracts values from a document based on the fieldName given to it.
IndexManager Allows indexes for a Datastore to be defined and queried.
QueryBuilder QueryBuilder builds a query, represented by a Map, which can be used in IndexManager.query(java.util.Map).
 

Enum Summary
IndexType The datatype used for an index.
SortDirection  
 

Exception Summary
IndexExistsException Thrown when trying to create an index that already exists.
